name: DITAZURE
description:
DITAZURE is an arcade game;

You wake up in deep darkness, kinda nowhere, surrounded by the voices;

Your only hope is power core which is slowly discharging;

You need to power it up, but how?;

Wait...., I think I see someone....

Oh sh***t;

Try to survive as long as you can and share your score; 

I've made this game for LD46 Compo, fortunately made it on time (like in half time);

Technical info:
-Made with Unity Engine
-Sprites and Animations were done in Aseprite
-Music and SFX were made in FL Studio 20
-Coding made in Visual Studio (hate this tho)

All things weer made by myself during this Ludum Dare;
Even this voices and distorted background music, I've recorded it by myself, yesterday (19.04) at 7 am;
